short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: PPSSPP Gold is an emulator for Android users. an emulator is a type of application that could run the application of other formats.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Well, an emulator is a type of application that could run the application of other formats. For example, if you want to play game on a PC, you have to install an emulator because Android games are not supported on PCs. Just like that, it is an emulator that is capable of playing PlayStation games on Android phones.

The previous version, which is ppsspp blue, has some limitations, and to fulfill that, the owner of ppsspp introduced PPSSPP GOLD.

How You Use:-

1. Firstly Click on "Add To Chrome" Button and install it.
2. After Install you need to click Icon on "Bookmark Bar".
3. After Open you see content about How you use.
4. Lets Enjoy :)
